title: Configuration schema for the Monitor Edge firmware from Particle
$comment: the $id field doesn't strictly mean that this schema only works with that release of monitor-edge, rather, this means that the schema here was created for that version of monitor-edge, and will work on earlier and later versions until a new schema is required.  This means that schema v10 will work with firmware v11, as long as there's no added features in v11 not already mentioned here

modbus_rs485.title: Modbus RS-485
modbus_rs485.description: Configuration for Modbus RTU with RS-485.

baud.title: RS-485 Baud
baud.description: Baud rate to operate the RS-485 bus.

parity.title: RS-485 Parity Bits
parity.description: Specifies partiy type used for the RS-485 bus.

imd.title: Modbus Inter Message Delay
imd.description: Delay between the last Modbus response and the next transmission in milliseconds.  This is used for rate limiting transactions.

modbus1.title: Modbus Polling 1
modbus1.description: Configuration for polling a Modbus server ID.

enable.title: Modbus Server Enable
enable.description: If enabled, poll the given Modbus server address.

id.title: Modbus Server ID
id.description: The remote device server ID (also known as slave ID). Range: 1-255.

timeout.title: Modbus Timeout
timeout.description: Allowable time to wait for a response in milliseconds. Range: 0-10000.

poll.title: Polling Interval
poll.description: Defines the frequency (in seconds) in which the register will be polled and results published.

publish.title: Publish polled value
publish.description: Select when to publish the polled value.

address.title: Register Address
address.description: Address to read from, zero based. Range: 0-65535.

mask.title: Mask Value
mask.description: 16-bit bitmask to apply to read value to isolate bits. Use 65535 if masking is not required. Range: 0-65535.

shift.title: Shift Value
shift.description: Shifting, in bits, to right shift read value after masking. Use 0 if shifting is not required. Range: 0-15.

offset.title: Offset Value
offset.description: Offset applied to masked and shifted input. This represents “b” in “y = mx + b”. Use 0 if not required (float variable).

scale.title: Scaling Value
scale.description: Scaling applied to masked and shifted input. This represents “m” in “y = mx + b”. Use 1 if not required (float variable).

sensorlow.title: Sensor low scaling
sensorlow.description: Scaling applied to calibrated voltage inputs to scale value to sensor units in application.

sensorhigh.description: Scaling applied to calibrated voltage inputs to scale value to sensor units in application.

sensorfc.description: Frequency for 3db low pass filtering of the voltage input in Hertz.

th_low_en.title: Threshold low enable
th_low_en.description: If enabled, publish an immediate event when the lower threshold is crossed.

th_high_en.title: Threshold high enable
th_high_en.description: If enabled, publish an immediate event when the upper threshold is crossed.

sensorlow.title: Sensor low scaling
sensorlow.description: Scaling applied to calibrated current inputs to scale value to sensor units in application.

sensorhigh.title: Sensor high scaling
sensorhigh.description: Scaling applied to calibrated current inputs to scale value to sensor units in application.

sensorfc.title: Sensor filter cutoff frequency
sensorfc.description: Frequency for 3db low pass filtering of the current input in Hertz.

th_low_en.title: Threshold low enable
th_low_en.description: If enabled, publish an immediate event when the lower threshold is crossed.

th_high_en.title: Threshold high enable
th_high_en.description: If enabled, publish an immediate event when the upper threshold is crossed.

th_fault_low.title: Threshold low fault comparator limit
th_fault_low.description: Threshold value, in milliamps, for fault comparator.

hyst_fault_low.title: Threshold low fault hysteresis
hyst_fault_low.description: Hysteresis value, in milliamps, for fault comparator.

th_fault_low_en.title: Threshold low fault enable
th_fault_low_en.description: If enabled, publish an immediate event when the lower threshold is crossed.

th_fault_high.title: Threshold high fault comparator limit
th_fault_high.description: Threshold value, in milliamps, for fault comparator.

hyst_fault_high.title: Threshold high fault hysteresis
hyst_fault_high.description: Hysteresis value, in milliamps, for fault comparator.

th_fault_high_en.title: Threshold high fault enable
th_fault_high_en.description: If enabled, publish an immediate event when the upper threshold is crossed.

immediate.title: Publish immediately on input change
immediate.description: If enabled, publish an immediate event when the digital input changes.

edge.title: Edge detection
edge.description: Publish on input change based on edge detected.

calgain.title: Calibration gain
calgain.description: Gain applied to raw voltage inputs to correct gain errors.

caloffset.title: Calibration offset
caloffset.description: Offset applied to raw voltage inputs to correct offset errors.

calgain.title: Calibration gain
calgain.description: Gain applied to raw current inputs to correct gain errors.

caloffset.title: Calibration offset
caloffset.description: Offset applied to raw current inputs to correct offset errors.

radius.title: Radius Trigger (meters)
radius.description: Publish location if it has moved this many meters from the last publish. 0 for unused.

interval_min.title: Maximum location update frequency (every n seconds)
interval_min.description: Never publish location information more often than this setting.

interval_max.title: Minimum location update frequency (every n seconds)
interval_max.description: Always publish location, when possible, this often

min_publish.title: Minimize Data
min_publish.description: If enabled, publish minimal location with only latitude and longitude. If disabled, publish additional information including speed, heading, etc.

lock_trigger.title: Publish on GPS lock
lock_trigger.description: If enabled, a change in GPS lock status will trigger a location publish, which will happen after the Minimum Interval has passed.

loc_ack.title: Acknowledge location publishes
loc_ack.description: If enabled, the device will expect cloud acknowledgement of location publishes and retry sending if cloud is unresponsive.  If disabled, the device will publish location messages and not account for cloud acknowledgement (fire-and-forget).  See https://docs.particle.io/reference/device-cloud/api/#tracker-configuration-events for more information

enhance_loc.title: Enhanced location
enhance_loc.description: If enabled, the cloud will process and send enhanced geolocation events based on GNSS, WiFi access points, and cellular tower triangulation.

tower.title: Publish cellular tower data
tower.description: If enabled, the device will collect nearby cellular towers and publish details with location events.

gnss.title: Publish GNSS data
gnss.description: If enabled, the device will utilize the GNSS module to generate and publish geolocation coordinates with location events.

wps.title: Publish WiFi access point data
wps.description: If enabled, the device will collect nearby WiFi access points and publish details with location events.

loc_cb.title: Call back to device with enhanced location data
loc_cb.description: If enabled, the cloud will send an enhanced geolocation to the device based on GNSS, WiFi access points, and cellular tower triangulation.

satdiag.title: Publish extra information to assist with debugging GNSS
satdiag.description: If enabled, publish GNSS constellation counts and C/NO characteristics.

enable.title: Store and Forward
enable.description: If enabled, the device will store unpublished location publishes to the local filesystem when offline and publish them when back online.

quota.title: Storage Size Limit
quota.description: Size in kilobytes to limit storage on the local filesytem for unpublished messages.

policy.title: Discard Policy
policy.description: When storage size limit is exceeded drop_old deletes the oldest logged publish to retry, drop_new deletes the newest

motion.title: Movement Sensitivity
motion.description: If not disabled, device will publish location if it detects movement. Low sensitivity requires a large motion to publish.

high_g.title: High-G
high_g.description: If enabled, device will publish location if it detects a High-G acceleration event.

high.title: High temperature threshold (Celsius)
high.description: Publish location once if temperature is greater than or equal to threshold. The temperature will be required to be less than the high threshold minus hysteresis to clear event, when latching, or publish again when latching disabled.  Hysteresis must be valid.

high_en.title: High temperature monitoring
high_en.description: If enabled, compare current temperature against high threshold.

high_latch.title: High temperature event latching.
high_latch.description: Enable latching of high temperature trigger event until temperature has fallen below hysteresis level; otherwise, generate one high temperature event.

low.title: Low temperature threshold (Celsius)
low.description: Publish location once if temperature is less than or equal to threshold. The temperature will be required to be more than the low threshold plus hysteresis to clear event, when latching, or publish again when latching disabled. Hysteresis must be valid.

low_en.title: Low temperature monitoring.
low_en.description: If enabled, compare current temperature against low threshold.

low_latch.title: Low temperature event latching.
low_latch.description: Enable latching of low temperature trigger event until temperature has risen above hysteresis level; otherwise, generate one low temperature event.

hyst.title: Hysteresis temperature threshold (Celsius)
hyst.description: Hysteresis threshold applied to high and low thresholds to allow further temperature publishes. 0.0 for unused.

sleep.title: Sleep
sleep.description: Configuration for low power operation. Supported in Asset Tracker Firmware v10 and later

mode.title: Sleep Mode
mode.description: If enabled, device will operate with low power states during inactive periods.  The device will be inaccessible while in low power states

exe_min.title: Post Publish Execution Time
exe_min.description: Minimum duration, in seconds, of guaranteed execution time after publishing and before entering sleep.

conn_max.title: Maximum Connecting Time
conn_max.description: Maximum duration, in seconds, to wait for a cellular connected state and GNSS lock before publish.

usb_cmd.title: USB Command
usb_cmd.description: If enabled, device will parse incoming commands on USB.

monitoring.title: Device Monitoring
monitoring.description: Configuration for device monitoring specific settings

device_monitor.title: Device Monitoring
device_monitor.description: If enabled, device will publish metrics and fault details.

interval.title: Wake interval (every n seconds)
interval.description: If device is configured for sleep, periodic interval to wake in order to evaluate geofences.

enable.title: Enable
enable.description: If enabled, the zone will be evaluated by the device.

lat.title: Latitude (Degrees)
lat.description: Latitudinal coordinate for the center point of the geofence.

lon.title: Longitude (Degrees)
lon.description: Longitudinal coordinate for the center point of the geofence.

radius.title: Radius (Meters)
radius.description: Defines circular area covered by the geofence.

inside.title: Publish inside zone
inside.description: If enabled, publish event when the device is inside the zone.

outside.title: Publish outside zone
outside.description: If enabled, publish event when the device is outside the zone.

enter.title: Publish on enter zone
enter.description: If enabled, publish event when the device has entered the zone.

exit.title: Publish on exit zone
exit.description: If enabled, publish event when the device has exited the zone.

verif.title: Time Before Trigger (Seconds)
verif.description: Amount of time the device is inside or outside the zone before triggering an event.
